data.name: Ragtag Racing Demo
data.detailed_description:
Ragtag Racing is a simple (and hopefully fun) 3D racing game which tries to celebrate the historic vehicles of motorsport along with the mayhem and perils that came with driving them.
Buckle up and see if you can complete the first 5 tracks of the full game in this short demo.
Stay out of trouble and don't loose momentum, use your boost to get ahead of the pack but make sure you don't run out of fuel.
data.about_the_game:
Ragtag Racing is a simple (and hopefully fun) 3D racing game which tries to celebrate the historic vehicles of motorsport along with the mayhem and perils that came with driving them.
Buckle up and see if you can complete the first 5 tracks of the full game in this short demo.
Stay out of trouble and don't loose momentum, use your boost to get ahead of the pack but make sure you don't run out of fuel.
data.short_description: Start your engines and join the mayhem in the Ragtag Racing demo.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.9 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 351 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.9 GHz or AMD equivalent / Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD equivalent / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 370 MB available space
